home.main_paragraph_1: I'm a Jr. FullStack Web Developer and i'm always in search of new motivations and challenges.
home.main_paragraph_2: I'm from Liguria, a passionate gamer and i'm always in charge to level up my skills!
home.download_cv_paragraph: I'm very happy to enter in contact with new realities, it's available my curriculum vitae to know more about me and my carreer.
home.about_me_paragraph: I consider myself a realistic, creative, professional person, driven by a strong curiosity for the world around me. I am passionate about technology and I am happy to meet new people and collaborate to achieve a common goal. In addition to video games, I am also passionate about board games and the improvisation that comes from playing Dungeons & Dragons. Music accompanies my coding sessions, preferably electronic or rock music.

contacts.page_description: By filling out this form, I will receive your message via email, and I will respond as quickly as possible. Thank you for your interest!
contacts.message_sended_banner_sentence: Thank you for contacting me, I will respond as quickly as possible.
